links.title: Tesla: Global Equities Rebuts CNBC Article with View from Loading Dock
links.description: Responding to yesterday's report by CNBC's Lora Kolodny claiming Tesla Motors ( TSLA) has a manufacturing problem, Trip Chowdhury of the boutique Global Equities Research disputes that claim, writing that he visited Tesla's Fremont, California factory yesterday and things look to him to be in good shape - judging from the cars sitting in the lot Chowdhury writes that at the Fremont facility he saw "more than 700 Model 3, S, X in the Holding Area, more than what we saw on March 11."

links.title: Investors just pumped the most money ever into stock funds for a single week
links.description: Michael Nagle | Bloomberg | Getty Images With the market correction barely a month in the rear-view mirror, investors have jumped back into stocks in record numbers. U.S. stock-focused funds took in $38.3 billion in fresh cash over the past week, a new peak that reverses much of the angst over the past several weeks, according to Bank of America Merrill Lynch.
